mapper.select: select * from member order by resdate desc
mapper.insert: insert into member values (#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{email}, #{tel}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{postcode}, #{birth}, default, default)
mapper.update: update member set pw=#{pw} where id=#{id}
update member set name=#{name}, email=#{email}, tel=#{tel}, addr1=#{addr1}, addr2=#{addr2}, postcode=#{postcode} where id=#{id}
update member set point=point+#{point} where id=#{id}
